Monologue.Current: “Я ей место заняла,{Line} а она где-то болтается...”
Monologue.Original: “I saved a seat, but{Line} where’s my study partner?”

Monologue.Current: “Блин, меня прибьют,{Line} если она скоро не появится!..”
Monologue.Original: “I’ll get in trouble if she{Line} doesn’t come back soon.”

Monologue.Current: “Привет.”
Monologue.Original: “Hi.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“...{Pause 48}{Line} I saw you in the infirmary.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...{Pause 48}{Line} I saw you in the infirmary.”

Monologue.Current: “You saved me from the monster.”
Monologue.Original: “You saved me from the monster.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who are you?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who are you?”

Monologue.Current: “Try to remember.”
Monologue.Original: “Try to remember.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Remember?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Remember?”

Monologue.Current: “It’d be heartbreaking for me{Line} to know I was forgotten.”
Monologue.Original: “It’d be heartbreaking for me{Line} to know I was forgotten.”

Monologue.Current: (...Remember?{Line} ...So I know this girl?)
Monologue.Original: (...Remember?{Line} ...So I know this girl?)

Monologue.Current: “It’d be nice to talk about old times again.”
Monologue.Original: “It’d be nice to talk about old times again.”

Monologue.Current: “Yes, {Char Squall}?”
Monologue.Original: “Yes, {Char Squall}?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Are you...Ellone?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Are you...Ellone?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“You’re Ellone?{Line} THE Ellone?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“You’re Ellone?{Line} THE Ellone?”

Monologue.Current: (What is going on?)
Monologue.Original: (What is going on?)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“You know...Laguna, don’t you?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“You know...Laguna, don’t you?”

Monologue.Current: Ellone{Line}“I do.{Line} I really love Uncle Laguna.”
Monologue.Original: Ellone{Line}“I do.{Line} I really love Uncle Laguna.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Then tell me! What is it{Line} that we experience!?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Then tell me! What is it{Line} that we experience!?”

Monologue.Current: Ellone{Line}“I’m sorry, {Char Squall}.{Line} It’s hard to explain.”
Monologue.Original: Ellone{Line}“I’m sorry, {Char Squall}.{Line} It’s hard to explain.”

Monologue.Current: Ellone{Line}“But...one thing...”
Monologue.Original: Ellone{Line}“But...one thing...”

Monologue.Current: “It’s about the past.”
Monologue.Original: “It’s about the past.”

Monologue.Current: (...So we were viewing the past?)
Monologue.Original: (...So we were viewing the past?)

Monologue.Current: Ellone{Line}“People say you can’t change the past.”
Monologue.Original: Ellone{Line}“People say you can’t change the past.”

Monologue.Current: “But even still, if there’s a possibility,{Line} it’s worth a try, right?”
Monologue.Original: “But even still, if there’s a possibility,{Line} it’s worth a try, right?”

Monologue.Current: (Change the past?{Line} Is she serious?{Line} Give me a break...)
Monologue.Original: (Change the past?{Line} Is she serious?{Line} Give me a break...)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Are you the one responsible!?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Are you the one responsible!?”

Monologue.Current: “Are you the one taking us{Line} to that ‘dream world’!?”
Monologue.Original: “Are you the one taking us{Line} to that ‘dream world’!?”

Monologue.Current: Ellone{Line}“I’m sorry.”
Monologue.Original: Ellone{Line}“I’m sorry.”

Monologue.Current: (...Not again.{Line} So much I don’t{Line} understand.)
Monologue.Original: (...Not again.{Line} So much I don’t{Line} understand.)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Why me!?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Why me!?”

Monologue.Current: “I have enough problems as it is!{Line} Don’t get me involved in this!”
Monologue.Original: “I have enough problems as it is!{Line} Don’t get me involved in this!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Don’t... Don’t count on me.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Don’t... Don’t count on me.”

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“{Char Squall}, did you find Ellone?”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“{Char Squall}, did you find Ellone?”

Monologue.Current: Ellone{Line}“Umm... I’m Ellone.”
Monologue.Original: Ellone{Line}“Umm... I’m Ellone.”

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“Are you all right?”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Are you all right?”

Monologue.Current: (What Ellone said under her breath was...)
Monologue.Original: (What Ellone said under her breath was...)

Monologue.Current: (You’re my only hope.)
Monologue.Original: (You’re my only hope.)

Monologue.Current: Студентка{Line}“Ты прочитал?”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“So, like,{Line} did you read it?”

Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Ты о том детективе{Line} с кровавым убийством?”
Monologue.Original: Male Student{Line}“Oh, you mean{Line} that bloody murder mystery?”

Monologue.Current: Студентка{Line}“Да-да-да! Классный, правда?!{Line} Догадался, кто был убийцей?”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“Did you find out{Line} who the killer was?”

Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Не сразу...{Pause 48} Слушай,{Line} а ты не пробовала читать{Line} что-нибудь более...”
Monologue.Original: Male Student{Line}“Y’know...{Pause 48} You should read{Line} somethin’ more enlightening.”

Monologue.Current: Студентка{Line}“Так тебе не понравилось?..{Line} Скучно, да?”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“So, like...{Line} You found it boring?”

Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Нет, сюжет интересный.{Line} Я о другом...”
Monologue.Original: Male Student{Line}“It was good...{Line} But what I’m tryin’ to say is...”

Monologue.Current: Студентка{Line}“Значит, понравилось!{Line} Вот, тогда прочитай ещё эту!”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“So you liked it!{Line} Then you’ll like this one, too!”

Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Ох...{Pause 64} Ладно...”
Monologue.Original: Male Student{Line}“...Oh, {Pause 64}ok...”

Monologue.Current: Студентка{Line}“Короче, она в совершенно другом стиле.{Line} И на самом деле, рассказчик и есть уби...”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“So, like, this book is written in a new style.{Line} The narrator is actually the kil...”

Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Эй! Блин, не спойлери!..”
Monologue.Original: Male Student{Line}“Hey! Geez, don’t give it away!”

Monologue.Current: “Хвааа{Pause 64}ааа{Pause 40}ааа{Pause 40}ааа{Pause 40}ааа{Pause 40}ааа{Pause 40}уаааф!!!{Pause 40}.”
Monologue.Original: “Hfwa{Pause 64}aaa{Pause 40}aaa{Pause 40}aaa{Pause 40}aaa{Pause 40}aaa{Pause 40}AAHHHH{Pause 40}.”

Monologue.Current: “Контроша скоро...{Line} Дополнительная...”
Monologue.Original: “I have a test comin’ up.{Line} It’s actually a make-up test.”

Monologue.Current: “Это ужасно!{Line} Почему я один её сдаю?!”
Monologue.Original: “It’s the worst, man...{Line} I’m the only one takin’ it.”

Monologue.Current: “I won’t be able to{Line} cooperate with my peers,{Line} if you know what I mean.”
Monologue.Original: “I won’t be able to{Line} cooperate with my peers,{Line} if you know what I mean.”

Monologue.Current: “I guess I actually have to study.{Line} Sucks...”
Monologue.Original: “I guess I actually have to study.{Line} Sucks...”

Monologue.Current: “Столы грязные, книги не убраны.{Line} Где шатается эта троица из{Line} библиотечного коммитета?!”
Monologue.Original: “The desks aren’t squeaky clean!{Line} Those 3 from the library committee...{Line} I bet they’re slacking off somewhere!”

Monologue.Current: “Им только развлекаться!..{Line} Хи-хи, да ха-ха...”
Monologue.Original: “All they do is{Line} yippity-yap, yippity-yap...{Line} Even when they’re alone, yippity-yap...”

Monologue.Current: “Да ещё так громко! Раздражает...”
Monologue.Original: “So annoyingly loud, I tell ya!”

Monologue.Current: “Hey, did you hear the library’s takin’{Line} requests for new books and stuff?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, did you hear the library’s takin’{Line} requests for new books and stuff?”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah, now that those pain in the neck{Line} faculty are gone, the library’s actually{Line} willing to stock books that we want.”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, now that those pain in the neck{Line} faculty are gone, the library’s actually{Line} willing to stock books that we want.”

Monologue.Current: “Did you hear that the library’s going to{Line} order books that we want!?”
Monologue.Original: “Did you hear that the library’s going to{Line} order books that we want!?”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah, they’re gathering{Line} requests from students now.”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, they’re gathering{Line} requests from students now.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh, I want mystery novels!{Line} Mystery novels all the way!”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, I want mystery novels!{Line} Mystery novels all the way!”

Monologue.Current: “I’m all for fiction.”
Monologue.Original: “I’m all for fiction.”

Monologue.Current: “Magazines would be cool, too.”
Monologue.Original: “Magazines would be cool, too.”

Monologue.Current: “Because of all that chaos that went on,{Line} I don’t have to take that{Line} make-up test anymore, but now{Line} I have to write a report instead!”
Monologue.Original: “Because of all that chaos that went on,{Line} I don’t have to take that{Line} make-up test anymore, but now{Line} I have to write a report instead!”

Monologue.Current: “Instructor Aki!{Line} You’re being too hard on me!”
Monologue.Original: “Instructor Aki!{Line} You’re being too hard on me!”

Monologue.Current: “It’s not everyday you get to{Line} experience your academy flying.”
Monologue.Original: “It’s not everyday you get to{Line} experience your academy flying.”

Monologue.Current: “I wish I could tell my{Line} little brother all about this{Line} new and exciting experience...”
Monologue.Original: “I wish I could tell my{Line} little brother all about this{Line} new and exciting experience...”

Monologue.Current: “Хихихи. Поиграем?”{Line}Ага{Line}Неа
Monologue.Original: “Hehe... So you wanna play with me?”{Line}Yes{Line}No
